body.name: ShrinLuck 2.5K Dash Cam Front and Rear, 64G SD Card, 1600P+1080P FHD Dual Dash Camera for Cars,3.2'' IPS Screen,176°+160° Wide Angle Dashcam, G-Sensor,Night Vision,WDR,Parking Monitor,Loop Recording
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 35 mins
features: 【2.5K+1080P FHD & 336°Wide Angle Dual Recording】-ShrinLuck brings you the S7 dash cam front and rear, which can record Ultra HD 2.5K (2560 x 1600P) front video + FHD 1080P rear video. It can help you read key details such as road signs and vehicle license plates more clearly, bringing you better driving pleasure and better security. This car camera is equipped with a 176° wide-angle front camera and a 160° wide-angle waterproof rear camera, recording everything without dead angle.

【3.2 Inch IPS Screen & Aluminum Alloy Case】-The large 3.2-inch full HD screen provides you with the clearest experience. The user interface on the large screen is very clear and it is very easy to operate and navigate the menus. At the same time, this dashcam is made of professional aviation aluminum alloy material. Compared with the plastic material of most sellers, our product not only has excellent texture, but also has a very good heat dissipation effect.

【Loop Recording & Evidence Protection】-Even if the micro SD card is full, the dash cam will continue to record, automatically overwrite the oldest video with the latest video, and ensure that the locked video is not overwritten. Moreover, We have solved the problem that most of the dashcams of the sellers have time intervals and key missing frames in the recorded video. By slicing the video, we can realize the seamless connection between the looped video and better preserve the video evidence.

【3-Axis G-Sensor & Accident Lock】-Our car camera has a high-performance G-sensor, and the sensitivity is further optimized, which can automatically record emergency situations and save the video. When the vehicle collides, the driving recorder will automatically save and lock the current video as evidence. Besides that, press the lock button to manually lock the current video, especially if you see something interesting/important on the road can also lock the footage.

【Super Night Vision & Parking Monitor】-Our car camera features a f1.5 aperture, the industry's largest 1/2.7'' CMOS image sensor and WDR technology for better color accuracy and clarity. Whether it is day or night, it can clearly capture small details such as night driving and license plates. If your vehicle crashes while parked, or someone tries to steal your car, the car camera will automatically turn on and start recording when it detects the vibration,providing 24h protection for your car.

【Easy to Install & Super After-Sales】-Our dash camera for cars adopts a slim and compact design, which will not block your sight when driving, allowing you to enjoy a comfortable driving experience. It's easy to install and set up, we additionally provide a wiring crowbar and detailed instructions, even first-time users don't have to worry. Please contact our after-sales mailbox to activate the 10-year warranty, and receive subsequent firmware updates and continuous improvement of new functions.

【Free USB Reader & Best Cost-Effective】-In order to make it easier for you to read the video on the Micro SD card, we have added an additional USB card reader(And the use of USB card reader will be more convenient than Mini USB cable transmission). Our dash cam not only integrates all mainstream technologies, but also carries the highest grade Sony STARVIS IMX498 CMOS. And we provide you with an free 64G SD card, which can meet all your needs and give you the best cost-effective experience.
body.description: Three Operating Modes 1. Video Recording Mode Connect the car charger and turn it on, the car camera will automatically enter the recording mode and start recording, the video resolution can reach 2.5K. 2. Photo Taking Mode Turn on the dash cam, press the mode button to switch to photo mode, then press OK to take a photo, and it can take HD photos up to 12MP. 3. Playback Mode This mode allows you to play recorded videos or view photos, and switch the video of the rear camera by long pressing UP button for 3 sec. ✔️Specification: Video Resolution: Front 2.5K/ Rear1080P Photo Resolution: 12MP Screen: 3.2" IPS Screen Wide Angle Lens：Front176°/ Rear160° Provide Free SD Card：64GB 3-Axis G-Sensor & Motion detection & Seamless Loop Recording WDR/HDR Technology & Super Night Vision

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ShrinLuck 2.5K dual recording dash cam, your driving safety guardian! ✔️ShrinLuck S7 is the most advanced and powerful 2.5K dual-recording dashcam today, with Novatek fast processor、SONY STARVIS IMX498 ultra-low light sensor、F1.5 large aperture and 8 glass wide-angle lens. ✔️The hardware is engineered to deliver crisp 2.5K video not only during the day, but also at night with its ultra-low light Sony STARVIS Sensor and Super Night Vision technology. ✔️It will get you out of trouble when you need evidence. When you are traveling by car, it will capture the scenery along the way for you. Whether it's design, features or accessories, we are committed to creating the highest quality car cameras. · Why Choose US? ✔️In addition to the most advanced and powerful hardware configuration we described above, and with a slim and compact design and unique aerospace aluminum housing, we give you the best experience in the industry in terms of user experience, video quality, product features, product texture. ✔️Strict quality control, with a professional QC team, passed CE, FCC and RoHS and other certifications. ✔️Perfect after-sales service: ShrinLuck provides 10 years free technical maintenance, and subsequent firmware updates and continuous improvement of new functions.

360° Rotatable Lens Package List: 1 * 2.5K+1080P Dash Cam Front And Rear1 * 64GB SD Card1 * USB SD Card Reader1 * Suction Mount1 * Car Charger1 * Wiring Crowbar1 * USB Data Cable1 * User Manual ✔️Exclusive Configuration Advanced Reversing Image Assist Dual Parking Mode Feature F1.5 Super Aperture Sony IMX498 Senso Aviation-grade Aluminum Alloy Case Three Operating Modes 1. Video Recording Mode Connect the car charger and turn it on, the car camera will automatically enter the recording mode and start recording, the video resolution can reach 2.5K. 2. Photo Taking Mode Turn on the dash cam, press the mode button to switch to photo mode, then press OK to take a photo, and it can take HD photos up to 12MP. 3. Playback Mode This mode allows you to play recorded videos or view photos, and switch the video of the rear camera by long pressing UP button for 3 sec. ✔️Specification: Video Resolution: Front 2.5K/ Rear1080P Photo Resolution: 12MP Screen: 3.2" IPS Screen Wide Angle Lens：Front176°/ Rear160° Provide Free SD Card：64GB 3-Axis G-Sensor & Motion detection & Seamless Loop Recording WDR/HDR Technology & Super Night Vision

Proficient in technology, Dedicated to safety! 2.5K+1080P FHD Resolution Our dash cam front and rear is equipped with high-performance Novatek chipset and SONY IMX498 Sensor, providing smooth 2.5K front video + 1080P rear video. It can vividly capture your driving moments, provide clearer video and images and playback key moments even at high speeds. 336° Wide Angle Lens S7 is a two-channel dash cam that provides 176° front camera and 160° rear camera, it can monitor the front and rear of the vehicle at the same time. Whether you want to capture the license plate number of the car ahead, or an important event happening to the side, it makes it easy. Built In 3-Axis G-Sensor Built-in G-sensor, the dashcam S7 can detect shaking and collisions around the vehicle, at which point it will lock the current video, store it on SD, and prevent it from being overwritten. Timely record the video during the accident, so that your safety and legal rights are always protected. The sensitivity of G-Sensor can be changed through settings.

Seamless Loop Recording Our dashcams for cars has a loop recording function, even if the micro SD card is full, it will automatically overwrite the oldest recording with the latest recording. But locked videos will not be overwritten. We provide you with a large-capacity high-speed read-write 64GB SD card, so that every second of your driving moment can be recorded without missing a second. Superior Night Vision With its SONY STARVIS IMX498 Sensor, F1.5 large aperture, and 8 pieces of glass, the S7 dashcam can capture all details with ultra-low light even in the dark. At the same time, the WDR algorithm automatically adjusts the optimal exposure balance, no more annoying overexposure and underexposure, ensuring better image quality and more natural details when driving at night. Unique Dual Parking Mode Feature Unlike any other dash cams, S7 dashcam has two distinct parking mode features. 1) Internal Battery Parking Mode No additional accessories needed. When parking monitoring is triggered, the camera automatically turns on and records a video to capture every detail. 2) 24h Parking Mode With an additional 3-Lead hardwire kit, 24-hour parking monitoring can be ensured for the dash cam.(3-Lead accessory is not included in the package).

Unique features for you Rear Camera & Reversing Image Assist The rear camera can be installed on the rear window or above the license plate, and it is IP69 waterproof, so you don’t have to worry about the rear camera installed on the license plate being damaged by rain. Not only can you get a clear 1080P FHD rear video as evidence of a rear-end collision, but also realize the reversing image function, making your parking safer and more convenient. Unique Screen Saver The screen saver feature allows your camera to automatically enter screen saver mode after 1/2/3 minutes, while it continuously records video in the background to ensure you can concentrate on driving. If you need to adjust the time to enter the screen saver mode, or keep the camera screen on all the time, you can do it in the system settings menu. Easy To Transmit You can use our gifted USB card reader to play or back up video and picture files in the Micro SD card, which will be more convenient and faster. Of course, you can also use the included USB data transfer cable to connect to PC/MAC to play or back up video and picture files.

Exclusive services for our clients 1. If you need to use the 24h parking monitoring function, you need to connect the Dash Cam to an external power supply. ✔️3-Lead Hardware Kit is required here, which is not included in the package. And all the sellers of the dashcam do not provide this accessory, but you can contact the after-sales mailbox in our manual, and we will help you solve it. 2. Because some brands of new cars do not have a cigarette lighter, but now the dash cam industry generally uses a cigarette lighter as a charging port, because it is more stable. ✔️In order to solve the problem of no cigarette lighter, you can contact our after-sales mailbox on the manual, we will give you a solution. · Warm Tips: 1. A high-speed 64G SD card we presented as a gift, which is specially customized by a cooperative manufacturer, has been placed in the package. And please format it when first use: Find the option of “Format” in dashcam and click “OK” button. 2. Our S7 dashcam are made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, which is not only resistant to high temperature but also to low temperature, maintaining good stability and durability even in harsh environments. Working Environment: Operating Temprature: -31°F (-35°C) ~ 176°F (80°C); Working Humidity: 5-95% 3. Without connecting the car charger, even if the battery of dash cam is fully charged, it will turn off automatically within 1 minute. It's not a battery problem, it's an automatic shutdown set by the system to save power for the purpose of recording video in emergency. All dash cams on the market are like this, please don't worry about the battery. ✔️Please always keep the dash cam plugged into the car's cigarette lighter to achieve the continuous operation of the dash cam. 4. Before inserting or removing the micro SD card, please be sure to turn off the power of the dashcam to avoid data loss. 5. When you need to access the menu settings, first press the OK button to stop video recording. 6. When you turn the car's engine ignition on/off, the S7 car camera will automatically turn on/off, which is a normal phenomenon. But if the dashcam keeps turning off and on, check if the adapter is connected well or try a new one. Then format the micro SD Card and restore factory settings in the menu.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutting-Edge Safety: Unleashing the Power of ShrinLuck 2.5K Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: I recently equipped my vehicle with the ShrinLuck 2.5K Dash Cam, and the transformation it brought to my driving experience is nothing short of remarkable. This dash cam has truly set the standard for safety, performance, and innovation.Sleek Design and Unobtrusive Installation:The sleek design of the ShrinLuck 2.5K Dash Cam seamlessly integrates into my car's interior, providing an unobtrusive yet powerful solution for capturing every moment on the road. The installation was a breeze, and it doesn't compromise my line of sight.Crystal-Clear Video Quality:The video quality delivered by this dash cam is exceptional. The resolution ensures that every detail is captured with precision, even in low-light conditions. The wide-angle lens provides an extensive view, leaving no room for blind spots.Durability and Weather Resistance:The ShrinLuck 2.5K Dash Cam has proven its durability in various weather conditions. From scorching heat to heavy rain, it continues to operate flawlessly. Its robust build instills confidence in its long-term reliability.Excellent Value for Money:Considering its advanced features and top-notch performance, the ShrinLuck 2.5K Dash Cam offers outstanding value for money. It competes with higher-priced models on the market without compromising on quality.Conclusion:In conclusion, the ShrinLuck 2.5K Dash Cam has exceeded my expectations, providing not just a recording device but a comprehensive safety and convenience solution for my journeys. I wholeheartedly recommend it to fellow drivers who prioritize safety, performance, and cutting-edge technology.This dash cam is a game-changer in the realm of automotive accessories, and I am confident that it will continue to set the standard for years to come.

reviews.reviewerName: Efficient camera for the price pointEfficient camera for the price point
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and small camera for price
reviews.reviewText: I was to purchase a dashcam bc it is better to be safe then sorry in todays world. I was looking for a camera that was small to not block my view, and a relatively cheap price point that gives good quality. This camera has it all for the price. The setup for the camera was also pretty easy considering I am the worst when it comes to setting anything up. I would purchase this camera bc it gives good quality, has a good view of the entire road, and if you are looking for something relatively small this would be the dashcam for you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Product at a budget friendly Price!!
reviews.reviewText: This Dash Cam is for those who are looking for a good quality product which ticks most of the requirements but has a very tight budget.I purchased this Dash Cam after multiple days of analysis on different shopping sites, comparing multiple Dash cameras with a tight budget.First of all I would like to thank Amazon for the quick delivery. I wanted to set up a Dash Camera in my car for multipurpose. Below are few points mentioned to justify the Five Star Rating1. Perfect Size of Front Camera2. Good installation guide book3. Ready to use 64GB memory card attached4. All the accessories in the box for self installation5. Rear parking/monitoring camera optional for those cars has already pre installed one6. Good Video/Picture quality captured while driving7. Wide angel coverage of Video8. Easy to mount and start/pause recording in a single

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A top-notch dashcam all around!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 2.5k front and rear dashcam, and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase. This product has exceeded all my expectations and has provided me with peace of mind on the road like never before.The video quality is outstanding, and the 2.5k resolution provides crystal-clear footage, capturing even the smallest details. Whether it's capturing license plates, road signs, or the scenery during a scenic drive, this dashcam delivers exceptional clarity.One of the standout features for me is the dual front and rear camera setup. It covers both ends of my vehicle, ensuring that I'm protected from all angles. The rear camera is especially useful for recording any incidents behind me, and it has already come in handy in documenting a minor fender-bender.The installation process was a breeze, and the user-friendly interface made it easy to configure the settings to my liking. The camera seamlessly starts recording when I turn on the ignition, and the loop recording feature ensures that I never miss an important moment.The G-sensor technology is a game-changer. It automatically locks and saves footage when it detects a sudden jolt or impact, which is crucial for ensuring that valuable evidence is preserved in case of an accident. It's like having a reliable witness on board at all times.The night vision capability is also impressive. I was initially concerned about the quality of nighttime recordings, but the dashcam performs exceptionally well in low-light conditions, ensuring that I'm protected 24/7.Overall, the 2.5k front and rear dashcam is a top-notch product. It offers exceptional video quality, user-friendly features, and the peace of mind that comes from knowing you have a reliable eyewitness on the road. I highly recommend this dashcam to anyone looking to enhance their safety and document their journeys with clarity and precision. It's worth every penny and then some!
